content.new:
When typing in a value for the pose of a link and hitting the Enter-key to acknowledge that value, the Reset-button is focused and will delete the Uri values in the Visual and Collision tabs, please see attached video.

Tested in Gazebo 7, 8 and 9.
content.old:
When typing in a value for the pose of a link and hitting the Enter-key to acknowledge that value, the Reset-button is focused and will delete the Uri values in the Visual and Collision tab, please see attached video.

Tested in Gazebo 7, 8 and 9.

issue.title: Link Inspector, hitting Enter-key will reset Uri values for a link
